thread.title: I would definitely stay here again
thread.title_full: I would definitely stay here again - Review of Hotel Sacha by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: anneeliz3
title: I would definitely stay here again
text:
great location, close to Sacre coeur (you can see it from the main street) yet doesn't have the feel of a touristy area. There are lots of bars and restaurants close by.
The hotel is lovely and quirky, staff are friendly and welcoming. Loved the champagne at 18.30 each evening.
The rooms are a bit small but comfortable and very clean.
Room Tip: rooms are small but it is a traditional parisian hotel See more room tips
